attributes.action: Re-introduce rating system which pre dated poll tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local rates should be charged using a system which charges people according to the services provided by theauthority in their area.The value of a home should NOT be taken into account for this tax. Many people bought their homes many years ago and have not been the cause of the rise in the value and indeed cannot benefit from that value unless drastically downsizing or dieing and leaving the monies to their families - who are then charged Inheritance Tax

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
